question: Who became the first living person in Switzerland to have a coin minted in her/his honour?
explanation: Tennis legend Roger Federer became the first living person in Switzerland to have a coin minted in his honour. The Federal Mint, Swissmint, has created a 20-franc silver coin bearing Federer\'s image. It\'s the first time in its history that Swissmint has created a commemorative coin to honour a living person.
